org.apdplat.word.dictionary.impl

Class AhoCorasickDoubleArrayTrie<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apdplat.word.dictionary.impl.AhoCorasickDoubleArrayTrie<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Dictionary

    public class AhoCorasickDoubleArrayTrie<V>
extends Object
implements Serializable, Dictionary
    An implemention of Aho Corasick algorithm based on Double Array Trie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
